Articles.Content:
Roll up roll up, this thread is dedicated to your ingenious creations for when your kerbals get bored of going into space. I want to see the most vomit inducing, nauseating, thrilling rides you can create. Rollercoasters, ferris wheels, spinning things, rocket rides, it all goes here! Ill start things off with 2 of my creations, which take advantage of the SAS modules to create spinning rides.

The Spintwister

This ride uses a ballbearing system and SAS modules to create a spinning plane ride for your little green friends! KAS is used for the cable connections from the ride to the mini aeroplanes with seats in them.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Craft File:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/1spwba0u5vmb70x/The%20Spintwister.craft You will need Kerbal Attachment System mod for this!

1. Press 9 to decouple the bearing

2. 3 will lower your little planes to the ground so your kerbals can get in.

3. 1 will raise the planes ready to spin round

4. Make sure you are controlling the craft from the probe at the top! use Q and E to spin the ride

The Vominatrix

A ride for your Kerbals if they never want to walk again, the aptly named Vominatrix will spin your Kerbals till their eyeballs pop out. This thing can throw them around in all directions and wont break too easily!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Craft File:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/fn47few2o4piaau/Vominatrix.craft This one is all stock, no mods are required!

1. Turn on the brakes which allows the craft to roll along the floor

2. Load up your kerbals, make sure you are controlling the craft from the small cube shaped probe in the middle, then use Q and E to roll the craft around

I look forward to seeing what crazy sadistic rides you can create for your kerbals!
